directions: In a large bowl, combine the black beans, corn, green onions, jalapeno peppers, bell pepper, avocado, pimentos, tomatoes, cilantro, lime juice, and Italian dressing. Season with garlic salt. Toss, and chill until serving.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
2 (15 ounce) cans whole kernel corn, drained
title: Black Bean Salad
